Write 116 at top Write your age just below that Subtract 2 from 1, i,e.

item.title: Urja Bigyan (Energy Science) Learnings Gist
item.description: Day1 Assignment: Day2 Biggest Celebration of Energy: Dashain Five major source of energy: Little on Ego Anger Little on Stress: Energy yet another prospective Day 3 Sankalpa Samarpaan बर्तमान मै छ सबै उर्जा Mantra Tip/Tricks: Day1 Two major sources: bhojan and sakaratmak sochan 4 major form of energy: physical energy{भौतिक शक्ति}{food, timing, exercieseब्यायाम, प्राणायाम} mental energy{बिरचार-मनकको शक्ति} emotional energy{भाव बाट उत्पन्न हुने शक्ति} spiritual energy{अाध्यात्मिक शक्ति} The value of them is such
